name: Drawing with Light
description:
*Play in Fullscreen* or download

Synopsis:
Sneak into the facility and shut off the power! But be careful, you'll have to find your way out in the dark. Use your trusty light gun on your way in to mark out the dangerous areas and help find your way out!

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to jump

Left click to shoot light markers

Created for LD39
